B C H I M O P R S T U V W 
All Classes|All Packages

H

handleDELETE(Request, PrintWriter) - Method in class http.server.ServerThread
Method used to handle DELETE Requests: Deletes the file specified in the URI If URI is equal to '/' or if the file is not found, sends 404 Code
handleGET(Request, OutputStream) - Method in class http.server.ServerThread
Method used to handle GET Requests: Sends the requested file if there are no parameters in the URI, processes the action to do otherwise.
handleHEAD(Request, PrintWriter) - Method in class http.server.ServerThread
Method used to handle HEAD Requests: Sends the head of the requested file in the URI.
handlePOST(Request, PrintWriter) - Method in class http.server.ServerThread
Method used to handle POST Requests: Writes the content of the body of the Request at the end of the file specified in the URI : if URI is absent (is equal to '/'), sends 404 Code
handlePUT(Request, PrintWriter) - Method in class http.server.ServerThread
Method used to handle POST Requests: Writes the content of the body of the Request in the file specified in the URI deleting the previous content: if URI is absent (is equal to '/'), sends 404 Code
handleUnrecognized(PrintWriter) - Method in class http.server.ServerThread
Method called when the method of the request is not supported by our server
headers - Variable in class http.server.Request
Map of the headers of the request with the key being the name of the header
http.client - package http.client
 
http.server - package http.server
